text:
Flying

Whenever Wingmate Roc attacks, you gain 1 life for each attacking creature.

text:
Flying

name: Winterflame
text:
Choose one or both —

"The mountains scream with the dragons' throats."
—Chianul, Who Whispers Twice

name: Witches' Eye
text:
Equipped creature has "{1}, {T}: Scry 1." (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Equip {1}

editions.flavor: The price of prophecy is a vacant eye socket.
Some bog witches practice the strange art of batrachomancy, reading portents in the number, size, and color of warts on a toad's hide.

name: Witness of the Ages
text: Morph {5} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

editions.flavor: It strode through the clash of dragons, the fall of Ugin, and the rise of the khans.

name: Wooded Foothills
text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wooded Foothills: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

editions.flavor: Where dragons' breath once burned, their bones now freeze.

name: Woolly Loxodon
text: Morph {5}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

editions.flavor: Even among the hardiest warriors of the Temur, loxodons are respected for their adaptation to the mountain snows.

name: Worst Fears
text: You control target player during that player's next turn. Exile Worst Fears. (You see all cards that player could see and make all decisions for the player.)

editions.flavor: Elspeth feared that her trespass into Nyx would not go unanswered.

name: Write into Being
text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Manifest one of those cards, then put the other on the top or bottom of your library. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

name: Xathrid Slyblade
text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
{3}{B}: Until end of turn, Xathrid Slyblade loses hexproof and gains first strike and deathtouch. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike. Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

editions.flavor: Designed by Rob Pardo

name: Xenagos, God of Revels
text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to red and green is less than seven, Xenagos isn't a creature.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, another target creature you control gains haste and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that creature's power.

name: Xenagos, the Reveler
text:
+1: Add X mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G} to your mana pool, where X is the number of creatures you control.
0: Put a 2/2 red and green Satyr creature token with haste onto the battlefield.
−6: Exile the top seven cards of your library. You may put any number of creature and/or land cards from among them onto the battlefield.

name: Yasova Dragonclaw
text:
Trample
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {1}{U/R}{U/R}. If you do, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power less than Yasova Dragonclaw's power until end of turn, untap that creature, and it gains haste until end of turn.

text:

Haste
